keyhole.name: Keyhole

usage.description: A 60-card expansion featuring worldbuilding questions about culture and beliefs. Each Keyhole card has 4 questions exploring different aspects of cultural practices, customs, and values.
integration: Per-Microsetting - Place one Keyhole card on each microsetting to define its unique cultural identity
After Map Complete - Draw Keyhole cards after finishing your world map to add cultural depth
Challenge Assumptions - Use questions to push beyond stereotypes and create nuanced cultures
Mix with Other Decks - Combine with Story Engine or other expansions for richer worldbuilding
notes: Each card has 4 questions - you can answer all 4 or just pick one that interests you
Questions are designed to be open-ended and encourage creative thinking
Works with any genre or setting - fantasy, sci-fi, historical, or contemporary
